<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H6171|עָרוֹד]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲרָד‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 57</sup> ***a***) <span class="bdbLangGreek">α</span>)] **noun masculine** ==wild ass== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac; √<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲרד‎</span>, perhaps = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***give a cry*** [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>SBWAk. cxlii.</sup> see II. 1900, see Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרוֺד‎</span> as loan-word ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>Aramaismen 72</sup>, but dubious [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG lvii (1903), 413</sup>)); — plural emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲרָדַיָּא‎</span> [[Dan.5.21|Dan 5:21]].
